H0.text: What city's catacombs contain the bones of over six million people. Rome

H1.text: What city's catacombs contain the bones of over six million people. Naples

H2.text: What city's catacombs contain the bones of over six million people. Vienna

H3.text: What city's catacombs contain the bones of over six million people. Paříž

A4.text: The Catacombs of Paris [...] hold the remains of more than six million people.

A5.text: Since 2013, the Catacombs have numbered among the fourteen City of Paris Museums managed by Paris Musées.
